==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|代|理|母}}

===Etymology 1===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=だいりはは|代理|tr1=dairi|t1=substitute, proxy, agent|母|tr2=haha|t2=mother}}.

This construction treats {{l|ja|代理}} as one word, and {{l|ja|母}} as a separate word, hence the [[訓読み|kun'yomi]] ''haha'' as used for {{l|ja|母}} on its own.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[da̠iɽi ha̠ha̠]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|だいり はは}}

# a [[woman]] who is [[impregnate]]d and [[give birth|gives birth]] for another woman: a [[surrogate mother]]

===Etymology 2===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=だいりぼ|代理|tr1=dairi|t1=substitute, proxy, agent|母|tr2=bo|t2=mother}}.

This construction treats {{lang|ja|代理母}} as one integral word, hence the [[音読み|on'yomi]] ''bo'' as used for {{l|ja|母}} in compounds.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[da̠iɽibo̞]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|だいりぼ}}

# a [[woman]] who is [[impregnate]]d and [[give birth|gives birth]] for another woman: a [[surrogate mother]]
